description: This file defines the function runInSandbox, which creates a sandboxed iframe environment to execute user-provided JavaScript code with security restrictions, manages communication with the iframe via postMessage, implements a watchdog timer, and provides cleanup functionality.

methods.name: runInSandbox({ container, code, onMessage, onComplete, onTimeout, onError })
methods.description: Creates and manages a sandboxed iframe, executes code within it, handles messaging, timeout, and cleanup.

ctags.name: runInSandbox
ctags.pattern: /^export function runInSandbox({ container, code, onMessage, onComplete, onTimeout, onError }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ container, code, onMessage, onComplete, onTimeout, onError })
